resources.string: Checking this, you won’t be notified of beta versions.
Just show me stable app version updates
You need to allow access to External Storage
You need to allow access to Get Accounts
The new version of an app doesn’t work on your device or some feature is missing? Block apps from updating. Go to Updates tab and long press on the app that you want to stop updating.
Quickly downgrade any app to a previous version and solve incompatibility issues. Keep a log of all your installed apps (via Aptoide) including version and install date.
